events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking page shows no updates and I'm very concerned about the delay.
The issue has been identified as a Delivery Delay based on the customer's report mentioning late shipment and tracking issues.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to the case to assist with the delayed shipment problem reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. I'll do my best to help you track it down.
Could you please provide me with your order number and any tracking information you have so I can investigate the shipping delay further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking code is ZX987654321. The tracking page hasn't updated since last week.
I've contacted the shipping carrier and found out there is a delay due to weather issues. We expect your package to arrive within the next 3 days. I will monitor the progress and keep you updated.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you looking into this and keeping me informed. I'll wait for the package in the coming days.
Your package was delivered today according to the tracking system. Please confirm once you have received it so we can close the case.
I received the package today and everything is intact. Thank you very much for your timely help and updates.
We hope you are satisfied with the delivery and your product. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your order has been successfully delivered and received, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our services in the future.
